TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreProviderBase extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SessionStateStoreProviderBase Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 定义数据存储区的会话状态提供程序所需的成员。

span.span: Defines the required members of a session-state provider for a data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 会话状态读取和写入 from 和 to 数据存储区中使用会话状态的会话数据存储提供程序。ASP.NET session state reads and writes session data from and to a data store using a session-state store provider. 会话状态存储提供程序是继承的类抽象类，并重写其成员实现特定于数据存储。A session-state store provider is a class that inherits the abstract class and overrides its members with implementations specific to the data store. 会话状态存储提供程序由期间 ASP.NET 页与存储的数据存储进行通信的处理和检索的会话变量和等的超时值的相关的会话信息的类。The session-state store provider is called by the class during the processing of an ASP.NET page to communicate with the data store for the storage and retrieval of session variables and related session information such as the time-out value. 每个单独存储每个 ASP.NET 应用程序中的会话数据属性。Session data within each ASP.NET application is stored separately for each property. ASP.NET 应用程序不共享会话数据。ASP.NET applications do not share session data. 你可以指定自定义通过设置 ASP.NET 应用程序的实现`mode`属性`sessionState`到的配置元素和`customProvider`属性的自定义提供程序，名称为本主题的示例所示。You can specify a custom implementation for an ASP.NET application by setting the `mode` attribute of the `sessionState` configuration element to and the `customProvider` attribute to the name of the custom provider, as shown in the example for this topic. ## 锁定会话存储数据Locking Session Store Data 由于 ASP.NET 应用程序是多线程，以支持对并发请求的响应，所以有可能并发请求可能会尝试访问相同的会话信息。Because ASP.NET applications are multithreaded to support responding to concurrent requests, it is possible that concurrent requests might attempt to access the same session information. 请考虑在所有框架集的多个帧访问同一个应用程序的位置的方案。Consider a scenario where multiple frames in a frameset all access the same application. 可以同时在不同线程在 Web 服务器上执行个框架集中每个帧的独立请求。The separate requests for each frame in the frameset can be executed on the Web server concurrently on different threads. 如果每个帧源的 ASP.NET 页访问会话状态变量，则会有多个线程同时访问的会话存储。If the ASP.NET pages for each frame source access session-state variables, then you could have multiple threads accessing the session store concurrently. 若要避免数据冲突，在会话存储和意外的会话状态行为和类包含了特定会话的持续时间以独占方式锁定会话存储项的锁定功能ASP.NET 页的执行。To avoid data collisions at the session store and unexpected session-state behavior, the and classes include lock functionality that exclusively locks the session store item for a particular session for the duration of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 请注意，即使属性标记为`ReadOnly`，在同一应用程序的其他 ASP.NET 页可能能够将写入到的会话存储中，以便从应用商店的数据可能仍最终等待只读会话的请求锁定数据释放。Note that even if the attribute is marked as `ReadOnly`, other ASP.NET pages in the same application might be able to write to the session store, so a request for read-only session data from the store might still end up waiting for locked data to be freed. 对会话存储数据请求，对的调用中的开头设置锁定方法。A lock is set on session-store data at the beginning of the request, in the call to the method. 完成请求后，在调用期间释放锁方法。When the request completes, the lock is released during the call to the method. 如果对象在调用过程中遇到锁定的会话数据或方法，它将重新请求的会话数据隔半秒直到释放锁或的时间，会话数据已被锁定超过的值属性。If the object encounters locked session data during the call to either the or the method, it will re-request the session data at half-second intervals until either the lock is released or the amount of time that the session data has been locked exceeds the value of the property. 如果超出超时执行时间，则对象将调用方法以释放会话存储数据并在该时间请求会话存储数据。If the execution time out is exceeded, the object will call the method to free the session-store data and request the session-store data at that time. 因为锁定会话存储数据可能会被释放通过调用方法对的调用之前在单独线程上当前响应的方法，无法尝试设置和发布具有的会话状态存储数据已发布并由另一个会话修改。Because locked session-store data might have been freed by a call to the method on a separate thread before the call to the method for the current response, an attempt could be made to set and release session-state store data that has already been released and modified by another session. 若要避免此情况下，和方法返回的锁定标识符。To avoid this situation, the and methods return a lock identifier. 此锁标识符必须包含每个请求以修改锁定的会话存储数据。This lock identifier must be included with each request to modify locked session-store data. 会话存储仅当数据存储区中的锁定标识符匹配由提供的锁定标识符时修改数据。Session-store data is modified only if the lock identifier in the data store matches the lock identifier supplied by the . ## 删除过期的会话存储数据Deleting Expired Session Store Data 当针对特定会话调用方法，该会话的数据将删除从数据存储区使用方法; 否则，数据将保留在服务器今后的请求的会话数据存储区为会话。When the method is called for a particular session, the data for that session is deleted from the data store using the method; otherwise, the data will remain in the session data store to server future requests for the session. 这就需要通过实现中删除过期的会话数据。It is up to the implementation to delete expired session data. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用自定义会话状态存储提供程序的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that is configured to use a custom session-state store provider. ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要实现继承的类的构造函数抽象类。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 值初始化实现传递给方法实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 创建要用于当前请求的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object to be used for the current request.
A new for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用ASP.NET 页中，请求的开始处方法期间事件。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 如果调用方法：The method is called if: - 传入的请求具有没有会话 ID，或the incoming request has no session ID, or - 传入的请求具有一个会话 ID，但在数据存储中找不到该会话。the incoming request has a session ID, but the session is not found in the data store. 方法创建一个新具有一个空对象对象，集合，并且指定`timeout`值。The method creates a new object with an empty object, an collection, and the specified `timeout` value. 可以使用检索的 ASP.NET 应用程序的集合方法。The collection for the ASP.NET application can be retrieved using the method. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 将新的会话状态项添加到数据存储区中。

span.span: Adds a new session-state item to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于会话时`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性都是`true`。The method is used with sessions when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both `true`. 具有`regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute`设置为`true`导致要生成一个新对象值时过期遇到值。Having the `regenerateExpiredSessionId attribute` set to `true` causes the object to generate a new value when an expired value is encountered. 生成一个新的过程值需要将浏览器重定向到包含新生成的 URL值。The process of generating a new value requires redirecting the browser to a URL that contains the newly generated value. 在包含过期的初始请求过程中调用方法值。The method is called during the initial request that contains an expired value. 后对象获取一个新值来替换过期的值时，它调用方法将未初始化的项添加到会话状态数据存储。After the object acquires a new value to replace the expired value, it calls the method to add an uninitialized entry to the session-state data store. 然后，将浏览器重定向到包含新生成的 URL值。The browser is then redirected to the URL containing the newly generated value. 会话数据存储区中未初始化的项是否存在可确保包括新生成的重定向的请求值不导致了错误的请求的过期的会话，而，相反，视为新的会话。The existence of the uninitialized entry in the session data store ensures that the redirected request that includes the newly generated value is not mistaken for a request for an expired session and is, instead, treated as a new session. 会话数据存储区中的未经初始化即的项是与新生成相关联值和只包含默认值，包括过期日期和时间，以及一个值，对应于`actionFlags`参数和方法。The uninitialized entry in the session data store is associated with the newly generated value and contains only default values, including an expiration date and time and a value that corresponds to the `actionFlags` parameter of the and methods. 会话状态存储区中未初始化的条目应包含`actionFlags`值等于枚举值。The uninitialized entry in the session-state store should include an `actionFlags` value equal to the enumeration value. 此值传递给对象和方法，并通知当前会话是新但的对象未初始化的会话。This value is passed to the object by the and methods, and informs the object that the current session is a new but uninitialized session. 对象然后会初始化该新会话，并引发`Session_OnStart`事件。The object will then initialize the new session and raise the `Session_OnStart` event. 有关无 cookie 会话的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about cookieless sessions, see the property. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 释放由 实现使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用时方法执行在应用程序域关闭。The method is called when the method executes at the closing of the application domain. 继承的类类可以使用此方法以释放不再使用中的任何资源。Classes that inherit the class can use this method to free any resources no longer in use. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 在请求结束时由 对象调用。

span.span: Called by the object at the end of a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用ASP.NET 页中，请求的末尾处方法期间事件。The object calls the method at the end of a request for an ASP.NET page, during the event. 你可以使用方法来执行任何所需的会话状态存储提供程序的每个请求清理。You can use the method to perform any per-request cleanup required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用开头的请求，方法期间事件，当属性设置为`ReadOnly`。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`. 如果属性设置为`true`、对象改为调用方法。If the attribute is set to `true`, the object instead calls the method. 方法返回对象填充数据存储区中的会话信息和更新会话数据的过期日期。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store and updates the expiration date of the session data. 如果在数据存储中，未不找到任何会话项数据方法设置`locked``out`参数`false`并返回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用方法在数据存储区中创建一个新会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果会话项在数据存储区中找到数据，但数据被锁定，方法设置`locked``out`参数`true`，设置`lockAge``out`为当前日期和时间减去的日期的参数和锁定此项目时的时间 （其中从存储中检索数据），设置`lockId``out`参数的锁定标识符从数据存储区，并返回检索`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用后半秒时间间隔，以尝试检索会话项信息的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information. 如果值的`lockAge``out`参数设置为超过值，则对象调用方法以清除在会话项数据，然后调用锁定再次方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceed the value, then the object calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`使用参数时同时`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性都设置为`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when both the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are set to `true`. `actionFlags`值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的项是需要初始化的新会话。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 通过调用创建会话数据存储区中的未经初始化即的项方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是未初始化的项，`actionFlags`参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实施者应设置`actionFlags``out`从当前项的会话数据存储区返回的值的参数。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`请求的会话存储的参数值项等于枚举值，则方法应将值设置为零后设置数据存储区中`actionFlags``out`参数。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: When this method returns, contains one of the values, indicating whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

summary.span: 从会话数据存储区中返回只读会话状态数据。

span.span: Returns read-only session-state data from the session data store.

returns.span: 使用会话数据存储区中的会话值和信息填充的 。

span.span: A populated with session values and information from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用开头的请求，方法期间事件，当属性设置为`true`，这是默认设置。The object calls the method at the beginning of a request, during the event, when the attribute is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果属性设置为`ReadOnly`、对象改为调用方法。If the attribute is set to `ReadOnly`, the object instead calls the method. 方法返回填充从数据存储的会话信息的对象更新所存储的数据的过期日期和请求的持续时间内锁定数据存储的会话项数据。The method returns a object populated with session information from the data store, updates the expiration date of the stored data, and locks the session-item data at the data store for the duration of the request. 如果在数据存储中，未不找到任何会话项数据方法设置`locked``out`参数`false`并返回`null`。If no session-item data is found at the data store, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `false` and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用方法在数据存储区中创建一个新会话项。This causes the object to call the method to create a new session item in the data store. 如果会话项在数据存储区中找到数据，但数据被锁定，方法设置`locked``out`参数`true`，设置`lockAge``out`为当前日期和时间减去的日期的参数和锁定此项目时的时间 （其中从存储中检索数据），设置`lockId``out`参数的锁定标识符从数据存储区，并返回检索`null`。If session-item data is found at the data store but the data is locked, the method sets the `locked` `out` parameter to `true`, sets the `lockAge` `out` parameter to the current date and time minus the date and time when the item was locked (which is retrieved from the data store), sets the `lockId` `out` parameter to the lock identifier retrieved from the data store, and returns `null`. 这将导致对象调用后尝试检索会话项信息并获取数据的锁的半秒间隔的方法。This causes the object to call the method again after a half-second interval to attempt to retrieve the session-item information and obtain a lock on the data. 如果值的`lockAge``out`参数设置为超出值，则调用方法以清除在会话项数据，然后调用锁定再次方法。If the value that the `lockAge` `out` parameter is set to exceeds the value, then the calls the method to clear the lock on the session-item data, and then calls the method again. `actionFlags`使用参数时`cookieless`和`regenerateExpiredSessionId`属性都设置为`true`。The `actionFlags` parameter is used when the `cookieless` and `regenerateExpiredSessionId` attributes are both set to `true`. `actionFlags`值设置为指示会话数据存储区中的项是需要初始化的新会话。An `actionFlags` value set to indicates that the entry in the session data store is a new session that requires initialization. 通过调用创建会话数据存储区中的未经初始化即的项方法。Uninitialized entries in the session data store are created by a call to the method. 如果会话数据存储区中的项不是未初始化的项，`actionFlags`参数将设置为零。If the item from the session data store is not an uninitialized item, the `actionFlags` parameter will be set to zero. 支持无 cookie 会话的自定义会话状态存储实施者应设置`actionFlags``out`从当前项的会话数据存储区返回的值的参数。Custom session-state store implementers that support cookieless sessions should set the `actionFlags` `out` parameter to the value returned from the session data store for the current item. 如果`actionFlags`请求的会话存储的参数值项等于枚举值，则方法应将值设置为零后设置数据存储区中`actionFlags``out`参数。If the `actionFlags` parameter value for the requested session-store item equals the enumeration value, then the method should set the value in the data store to zero after setting the `actionFlags` `out` parameter. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void InitializeRequest (System.Web.HttpContext context);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeRequest(class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub InitializeRequest (context As HttpContext)
public: abstract void InitializeRequest(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context);

param.name: context
param.span: 当前请求的 。

span.span: The for the current request.

summary.span: 由 对象调用，以便进行每次请求初始化。

span.span: Called by the object for per-request initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法，然后才能调用任何其他方法。The object calls the method before calling any other method. 你可以使用方法来执行任何所需的会话状态存储提供程序的每个请求的初始化。You can use the method to perform any per-request initialization required by your session-state store provider. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void ReleaseItemExclusive (System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, object lockId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReleaseItemExclusive(class System.Web.HttpContext context, string id, object lockId) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ReleaseItemExclusive (context As HttpContext, id As String, lockId As Object)
public: abstract void ReleaseItemExclusive(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ id, System::Object ^ lockId);

param.name: context
param.span: 当前请求的 。

span.span: The for the current request.

param.name: id
param.span: 当前请求的会话标识符。

span.span: The session identifier for the current request.

param.name: lockId
param.span: 当前请求的锁定标识符。

span.span: The lock identifier for the current request.

summary.span: 释放对会话数据存储区中项的锁定。

span.span: Releases a lock on an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来更新的到期日期并释放会话数据存储区中的项上的锁。The object calls the method to update the expiration date and release a lock on an item in the session data store. 它在结束时调用的请求期间事件，如果会话值未更改。It is called at the end of a request, during the event, if session values are unchanged. 如果会话值进行了修改，对象改为调用方法。If session values have been modified, the object instead calls the method. 对象还将调用方法超过会话数据存储区中的项上的锁时值。The object also calls the method when a lock on an item in the session data store has exceeded the value. 有关锁定的详细信息和有关的锁定标识符的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储数据"中类概述。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. 方法仅从一项中的当前应用程序与匹配提供的会话的会话数据存储中删除锁`id`和`lockId`值。The method only removes the lock from an item in the session data store for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values. 如果`lockId`与数据存储中的一个不匹配方法不执行任何操作。If the `lockId` does not match the one in the data store, the method does nothing. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

span.span: The that represents the item to delete from the data store.

summary.span: 删除会话数据存储区中的项数据。

span.span: Deletes item data from the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法末尾的请求期间事件，若要从会话数据存储区删除会话选项的数据，如果调用方法。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to delete the data for a session item from the session data store if the method has been called. 匹配提供的会话的当前应用程序仅会话数据`id`和`lockId`删除值。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is deleted. 有关锁定的详细信息和有关的锁定标识符的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储数据"中类概述。For more information about locking and details about the lock identifier, see "Locking Session-Store Data" in the class overview. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

param.name: context

span.span: The for the current request.

param.name: id
param.span: 当前请求的会话标识符。

summary.span: 更新会话数据存储区中的项的到期日期和时间。

span.span: Updates the expiration date and time of an item in the session data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来更新到当前日期和时间加上该会话的到期日期和会话时间值时任一：The object calls the method to update the expiration date and time for a session to the current date and time plus the session value when either: - 属性是`true`，或the attribute is `true`, or - 请求未引发和由于出错的事件。the request did not raise the and events due to an error. 如果请求 ASP.NET 页和属性设置为`false`、仍调用方法以更新的到期日期和时间的会话数据存储区中的数据。If an ASP.NET page is requested and the attribute is set to `false`, the method is still called to update the expiration date and time of the data in the session data store. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

param.span: 如果为 ，则将会话项标识为新项；如果为 ，则将会话项标识为现有的项。

span.span: to identify the session item as a new item; to identify the session item as an existing item.

summary.span: 使用当前请求中的值更新会话状态数据存储区中的会话项信息，并清除对数据的锁定。

span.span: Updates the session-item information in the session-state data store with values from the current request, and clears the lock on the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法末尾的请求期间事件，将当前会话项信息插入到数据存储或使用当前值，更新数据存储区中的现有会话项信息若要更新的到期时间，该项目，并释放对数据的锁定。The object calls the method at the end of a request, during the event, to insert current session-item information into the data store or update existing session-item information in the data store with current values, to update the expiration time on the item, and to release the lock on the data. 匹配提供的会话的当前应用程序仅会话数据`id`和`lockId`更新值。Only session data for the current application that matches the supplied session `id` and `lockId` values is updated. 锁定的详细信息，请参阅"锁定会话存储区数据"中类概述。For more information about locking, see "Locking Session Store Data" in the class overview. 如果当前请求的会话值不进行了修改，不调用方法。If the session values for the current request have not been modified, the method is not called. 相反，调用方法。Instead, the method is called. 如果已调用方法，不调用方法。If the method has been called, the method is not called. 相反，对象调用方法来从数据源删除会话项数据。Instead, the object calls the method to delete session-item data from the data source. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool SetItemExpireCallback (System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback expireCallback);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetItemExpireCallback(class System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemExpireCallback expireCallback) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function SetItemExpireCallback (expireCallback As SessionStateItemExpireCallback) As Boolean
public: abstract bool SetItemExpireCallback(System::Web::SessionState::SessionStateItemExpireCallback ^ expireCallback);

param.name: expireCallback
param.span: 对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托。

span.span: The delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 设置对 Global.asax 文件中定义的 事件的 委托的引用。

span.span: Sets a reference to the delegate for the event defined in the Global.asax file.

returns.span: 如果会话状态存储提供程序支持调用 事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the session-state store provider supports calling the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象调用方法来确定在初始化模块时是否调用`Session_OnEnd`支持事件实现并将关联委托以及`Session_OnEnd`事件。The object calls the method when the module is initialized to determine whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported by the implementation and to associate the delegate with the `Session_OnEnd` event. 自定义会话状态存储提供程序实施者应使用方法，以通知对象是否调用`Session_OnEnd`支持事件并将本地引用设置为由提供的委托`expireCallback`参数。Custom session-state store provider implementers should use the method to inform the object whether calls to the `Session_OnEnd` event are supported and to set a local reference to the delegate supplied by the `expireCallback` parameter. 自定义实现必须确定何时本地将调用委托。The custom implementation must decide when the local delegate will be called. 例如，无法在调用过程中调用该委托方法，它放弃会话时调用。For example, the delegate could be called during the call to the method, which is called when a session is abandoned. ## Examples 有关会话状态存储提供程序实现的示例，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For an example of a session-state store provider implementation, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).
